'''Machine Assembly Line''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When played, this card creates a Character Status that performs its effect. This Status accumulates Battle-Readiness when that character takes DMG, or when that character is healed. 
* After clearing Battle-Readiness points to play a Weapon or Artifact, the Character Status created by this card is removed.

==Story==
{{Description|Countless widgets, heated and forged, eventually go into making these exceptional machines, and to the inmates of the Fortress of Meropide, they mean valuable Credit Coupons...|title=Machine Assembly Line}}
